name: Chalice (Devin Martin)
description: Chalice  is a hardcore platformer inspired by the likes of Super Meat Boy and Celeste. You play as a nameless treasure hunter who's in search of the fabled "Chalice," which is said to grant eternal life. You will be dodging spikes, avoiding lasers and altering gravity to climb your way up to the top of the castle, looking for keys and coins along the way!
